Brush and Floss Regularly: Even without dentists, you can still take care of your teeth by brushing and flossing regularly. This will help remove plaque and prevent tooth decay.
Use Oral Health Products: There are many over-the-counter oral health products available, such as mouthwash, toothpaste, and floss, that can help keep your teeth clean and healthy.
Visit a Dentist at Home: Some people choose to visit a dentist at home, where they can receive a professional cleaning and checkup.
Use Natural Remedies: There are many natural remedies for oral health, such as baking soda and water for teeth whitening, and herbal mouth rinses for freshening breath.

Make Your Own Toothbrush: If you don't have access to a dentist or oral health products, you can make your own toothbrush using a soft-bristled toothbrush head and a handle made of a natural material like wood or bamboo.
